condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 11 - IYCF and malnutrition : Systems are in place in 5 most deprived regions of Ghana to ensure access and utilization of high impact nutrition specific interventions.

description.narrative: 7000 health workers and teachers have improved knowledge on nutrition and gender needs and are implementing the Girls' Iron-Folate Tablet Supplementation (GIFTS) in four regions, reaching over 350,000 adolescent girls. Further, 150 hospitals have strengthened capacity on breastfeeding support, while 6,939 severely malnourished children recovered. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2017

title.narrative: GES and GHS staff trained on micronutrient supplementation and home fortification in 4 regions

actual.value: 2017:UNICEF procured and delivered 9438 cartons of RUTF, down from 11,746 cartons procured in 2016
